00070 #ifndef KYRA_TILE_INCLUDED
00071 #define KYRA_TILE_INCLUDED
00072 
00073 #include "image.h"
00074 #include "tileresource.h"
00075 
00076 
00077 struct KrPaintInfo;
00078 class  KrTileResource;
00079 union KrRGBA;
00080 
00081 
00098 class KrTile : public KrImage
00099 {
00100   public:
00101         KrTile( KrTileResource* resource );
00102         virtual ~KrTile();
00103 
00114         void SetRotation( int rotation );
00115         int  GetRotation()                                              { return rotation; }
00116 
00118         int Size() const        { return resource->Size(); }
00119 
00120 
00121         virtual void Draw(      KrPaintInfo* paintInfo, 
00122                                                 const KrRect& clip,
00123                                                 int window );
00124 
00125         virtual KrImNode* Clone();
00126 
00127         virtual bool HitTest( int x, int y, int flags, GlDynArray<KrImage*>* results, int window );
00128 
00129         virtual void CalcTransform( int window );
00130         virtual void QueryBoundingBox( KrRect* boundingBox, int window = 0 );
00131 
00132         virtual KrTile*  ToTile()                               { return this; }
00133         virtual KrResource* Resource()                  { return resource; }
00134         KrTileResource* TileResource()                  { return resource; }
00135         
00136   protected:
00137 
00138   private:
00139         int rotation;
00140         KrTileResource* resource;
00141 };

00144 #endif
